product_summary.description: Gymreapers Lifting Wrist Straps are 18-inch, 100% cotton straps with neoprene padding, designed for increased grip and support during weightlifting.  Sold as a pair, they are fully adjustable and offer a lifetime guarantee.
product_summary.main_problems: The main problems are durability issues reported by several users, contradicting the lifetime guarantee claim.  A noticeable smell develops after prolonged use, and some users wished for shorter length options.

complete_report.product_analysis: The Gymreapers Lifting Wrist Straps receive positive feedback for improved grip, comfort, and customer service. However, significant durability concerns need immediate attention.  The product's lifetime guarantee is undermined by these issues.  Addressing the smell and offering different lengths are also important.
complete_report.competitor_analysis: Competitors offer products in different categories (resistance bands and knee braces).  While they don't directly compete, their success highlights the potential for Gymreapers to expand its product line and target a broader audience.  The lack of widespread durability complaints for competitors underscores the need for Gymreapers to improve its product quality.
complete_report.recommendations: Gymreapers should prioritize improving durability through material and design changes.  Clear communication of the warranty process and proactive customer service are crucial.  Expanding the product line and conducting thorough market research to identify unmet needs will enhance competitiveness.
